description: Deletes the specified resource group. Deleting a resource group does not delete any resources that are members of the group; it only deletes the group structure. To run this command, you must have the following permissions:

nested_items.name: GroupArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon resource name (ARN) of the resource group.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the resource group.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the resource group.

nested_items.name: Criticality
nested_items.description: The critical rank of the application group on a scale of 1 to 10, with a rank of 1 being the most critical, and a rank of 10 being least critical.

nested_items.name: Owner
nested_items.description: A name, email address or other identifier for the person or group who is considered as the owner of this application group within your organization.

nested_items.name: DisplayName
nested_items.description: The name of the application group, which you can change at any time.

nested_items.name: ApplicationTag
nested_items.description: A tag that defines the application group membership. This tag is only supported for application groups.
